messages.message: Another small nitpick - I know it says do not navigate away from page (which I assume refers to a website), if I click on slack (or any other app) while things are uploading (which can take a long time with 6 long PDFs), then the upload message disappears and there is just a white page. That can take a long time. Only after a while, you see the file names appearing in the document window and you realize things are still uploading. Multiple times I thought things had crashed and refreshed it to redo it and patiently uploaded all files without touching anything else.

it would work better I think to have an upload window that is persistent, or to see the file names that are being uploaded straight away, or show a progress bar. Right now it is just circling and you're not sure how far along it is. Not an issue with a single short file, but if you have a dozen heavy ones, it is quite different
